songs.title: Russian Roulette (Tony Moran, Warren Rigg, Dave Saronson Pounding Dub Mix)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
And you can see my heart beating

[Instrumental Break 1]

[Chorus]
And you can see my heart beating
Said I'm terrified, but I’m not leaving (But I'm not leaving)
So just pull the trigger
(Trigger, trigger)

[Break 1]
(Trigger, trigger)
(Trigger, trigger)
(Trigger, trigger)
(Trigger, trigger)

[Verse]
Say a prayer
Sometimes it helps
A scary thought
Means he's never lost

[Chorus]
And you can see my heart beating
Said I’m terrified, but I'm not leaving (But I'm not leaving)
And you can see my heart beating
(In my heart, in my heart)
(In my heart, in my heart)
(In my heart, in my heart)

[Instrumental Break 2]

[Break 2]
(But I'm not leaving)
(Leaving)
(But I'm not leaving)
(Leaving)
(But I'm not leaving)
(Leaving, leaving, leaving)
(But I'm not leaving)
(Leaving, leaving, leaving)

[Chorus]
And you can see my heart beating
Ouh-oh, you can see it through my chest
Said I'm terrified but I’m not leaving, no (But I’m not leaving)
Know that I must pass this test
You can see my heart beating
Oh, you can see it through my chest
I'm terrified but I’m not leaving, no, no (But I'm not leaving)
And you can see my heart beating
(In my heart, in my heart)
(In my heart, in my heart)
(In my heart, in my heart)
